name: BANG BANG (pataya)
description:
hone your reflexes with this cowboy duel simulatorwait for the countdown and shoot. but not too early!

you only need one (1) button to play this game!
play with one, two or a hundred friends as each player only uses one key of the keyboard!
and if you have no friends that's ok you can play with bots. bots will be your friends
